name: Artoria Pendragon (Saber & Saber Alter) アルトリア・ペンドラゴン (セイバー & セイバー オルタ) / Fate/Stay Night
description:
weight 0.9 ~ 1 is best.

I created this LoRA as requested.

Please read the description. (5 outfits)


outfit1
aasaber, green eyes, ahoge, gauntlets


outfit2
bbsaber, green eyes, ahoge


outfit3
ccsaber, blonde hair, green eyes, ahoge, white shirt, blue skirt, black pantyhose


outfit4
ddsaber, pale skin, black dress


outfit5
eesaber, pale skin, black dress, black armor

This is Saber from Fate/Stay Night, including the Heaven's feel. This is not Saber from FGO.

Trigger words also contain outfit data, so applying prompts with untrained outfits can result in limited outfits.
If you try, lower the Weight value to 0.7 or 0.8

modelVersions.name: v2.0
trainedWords: ccsaber, blonde hair, green eyes, ahoge, white shirt, blue skirt, black pantyhose
eesaber, pale skin, black dress, black armor
